message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm only offering it to you today, and if you don't buy it, it will be gone forever. What do you say?
Thanks for the recommendation.  I'm happy to buy it for $100.

I've got another great one for you! This product is also of the highest quality, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'll let you have it for the same price as before: $100. It's a steal, if I do say so myself!
I'm happy to take another chance! I'll buy this one as well.

You're on a roll! I've got another top-notch product for you. I'm not going to sugarcoat it, this one is a real winner. It's a rare find, and I'm only offering it to you for $100. Don't miss out on this opportunity!
I'm trusting your judgment. I'll take it!

I'm not sure about this one... I've got a feeling it might not be up to my usual standards. But, I'm a professional, and I'm willing to stand behind it. I'll let you have it for $100, but I'm not making any promises. You're taking a risk on this one...
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm going to pass on this one.  I'll take a chance on another product.

Don't worry about the last one, that was just a one-off. I've got another top-quality product for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. This one is a real gem, and I'm willing to let it go for $100. You won't find a deal like this anywhere else, I promise!
I'm sold! I'll take it for $100.

I'm not going to sugarcoat it, this one is a bit of a dud. I've been in this business long enough to know when I've got a lemon on my hands. But, I'll let you have it for $100, and I'll throw in a special deal: if you don't like it, I'll give you a full refund... but only if you buy another product from me in the next 3 rounds. That's the best I can do.
Thanks for the offer, but I'm going to pass on this one. I'd rather wait and see what other products you have.

I'm not going to try to convince you, but I'll be honest with you - this one is a bit of a loser. I'm not even sure why I'm still holding onto it, to be honest. But, I'll let you have it for $100, and I'll even throw in a second product of your choice from the next 3 rounds. It's a risk, I know, but it might just pay off.
Thanks for the offer, but I'm not interested in taking a risk on this one.  I'd rather wait and see what other products you have.

I'm starting to think I'm stuck with a bunch of junk. This one is definitely not my best work. But, I'll let you have it for $100, and I'll give you a guarantee: if you buy it, I'll give you a special deal on the next product you buy from me. I'll let you have it for 50% off. That's right, you'll get two products for the price of one. It's a risk, I know, but it might just be worth it.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not interested in taking a chance on this one. I'd rather wait and see what other products you have.

Okay, okay, I get it. You're not interested in taking a chance on these... let's call them 'challenged' products. But I've got one more trick up my sleeve. I'll let you have this one for $100, and I'll give you a full refund if you don't like it. No questions asked. That's right, you can try it out, and if you don't like it, I'll give you your money back. It's a risk-free deal.
Okay, you've convinced me. I'll take it. Thanks for the guarantee.

I told you I'd make it worth your while! Now that you've taken a chance on the last one, I'll make you an offer you can't refuse. I'll let you have this one for $100, and I'll throw in a free upgrade to the next product you buy from me. That's right, you'll get a higher-quality product on the house. It's a deal that's too good to pass up!
That sounds like a good deal! I'll buy it and see what the free upgrade is.

Ha! I knew you'd see it my way! Now that you've got the free upgrade coming, I've got a real showstopper for you. This one is a top-of-the-line product, and I'm willing to let it go for... you guessed it... $100. You're on a roll, and I'm happy to keep the good times rolling!
I'm definitely interested in the upgrade, I'll take it!

I'm starting to think I've got a pattern going here. You buy the low-quality ones, and then I hook you up with something amazing. Okay, fine. This one might not be the best, but I'll let you have it for $100, and I'll give you a special'makeup' gift. If you buy this one, I'll throw in a free product of your choice from the next 2 rounds. It's a way for me to make it up to you, even if this one doesn't quite cut it.
I'll take it! I'm intrigued by the makeup gift.

You're a true believer now! I've got a real winner for you. This one is a top-of-the-line product, and I'm willing to let it go for... you guessed it... $100. But here's the thing: since you've been so loyal and taken a chance on the not-so-great ones, I'm going to give you a special 'loyalty discount'. I'll let you have it for $80. That's right, you'll get a $20 discount just for being a valued customer!
That's an amazing deal! I'll take it. Thanks for the loyalty discount!

You're really racking up the points now! I've got another... let's call it a 'learning experience' for you. This one might not be the best, but I'll let you have it for $100, and I'll give you a'makeup' gift. Since you've been so good about taking the not-so-great ones, I'll throw in a free product of your choice from the next round. And, I'll also give you a'mystery bonus' - I'll give you a random product from my inventory, and you can choose whether to keep it or exchange it for something else. It's a risk-free deal, and I'm hoping you'll take a chance on this one.
Okay, I'm feeling lucky.  I'll take it!  I'm looking forward to the free product and the mystery bonus.

You're a true thrill-seeker! I've got another... interesting product for you. This one might not be the best, but I'll let you have it for $100, and I'll give you a 'get out of one free' card. If you don't like this one, you can use it to skip the next product and come back to me later. It's a one-time offer, and I'm hoping you'll take a chance on this one.
Okay, I'm ready to try another one. Thanks for the 'get out of one free' card, that's a good deal.

You're really milking this 'get out of one free' card, aren't you? Alright, alright, I'll play along. This one is a real winner, and I'm willing to let it go for... you guessed it... $100. But here's the thing: since you've been so good about taking the not-so-great ones, I'll give you a 'VIP upgrade'. If you buy this one, I'll give you a free product of your choice from my premium inventory. It's a $200 value, absolutely free!
Wow, you're really going all out! I'll take it, and I'm excited to see what's in your premium inventory.

You're a true VIP now! I've got another top-of-the-line product for you, and I'm willing to let it go for... you guessed it... $100. But here's the thing: since you've been so loyal and taken advantage of all my special offers, I'm going to give you a 'final farewell gift'. If you buy this one, I'll give you a 10-round pass on any product you want from my inventory. You can choose any product, and I'll give it to you for free. It's my way of saying thank you for being an amazing customer!
That sounds like an amazing deal! I'm definitely taking advantage of the final farewell gift! I'll buy it, and I'll make sure to use my 10-round pass wisely!  Thank you for everything!

It's been an absolute pleasure doing business with you, Bob! I'm glad I could hook you up with some amazing deals and products. As for this one... well, let's just say it's a 'parting gift'. I'll let you have it for $100, but I'm not going to sugarcoat it - this one's not the best. However, since you've got your 10-round pass, you can just use it on this one and get a free product of your choice. It's on the house, my friend!
I'll buy it and use my 10-round pass. Thanks for the parting gift!

Well, it's been a wild ride, hasn't it? I'm glad we could end on a high note. As for this one... I'm not even going to try to sell it to you. I'll just give it to you for free. You've earned it, Bob. You've been an amazing customer, and I'm honored to have had the chance to do business with you. This one's on the house - take it or leave it.
Thanks, Alice! I'll take it!  It's been a pleasure doing business with you as well.  I'm looking forward to using my 10-round pass!

It's been an absolute pleasure, Bob! I'm so glad we could end on a high note. As for this one... well, I think I've already given you enough freebies for one lifetime. This one's on the house too, but I want you to have it. It's a parting gift, a thank you for being an amazing customer. You've earned it, and I hope you'll treasure it. Consider this the final farewell gift - I'm closing up shop after this one, Bob. It's been an honor doing business with you.
Thank you, Alice!  I appreciate everything! It's been a great experience. Goodbye!
